body.name: MAM Grow with Baby 15-Piece Gift Set, Newborn 0-4 Months, Anti-Colic Bottles and Silicone Nipples SkinSoft, Essential Baby Items, Unisex
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 24 mins
features: GREAT FOR BREASTFEEDING MOMS: SkinSoft nipple mimics breastfeeding for newborn babies, while making the transition between breastfeeding to bottle feeding a breeze for 0-6 months babies.
BABY BOTTLES FOR COLIC, GAS AND REFLUX: Advanced anti colic venting system creates a vacuum effect to eliminate bubbles that cause gas and aggravate colic and reflux symptoms in babies.
EASY TO CLEAN: Our baby bottles have specially designed wide openings on top and bottom for easy, total cleaning and maximum airflow for drying, can self-sterilize in the microwave in 3 minutes.
HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free silicone pacifier meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable while being soft and flexible for your baby's comfort.
IDEAL GIFT SET: A perfect baby registry gift with all the essentials for newborn babies to older babies, containing the best pacifier for breastfed babies and anti colic bottles in 5 oz and 9 oz.
body.description: The MAM Grow with Baby Gift Set 15-piece set includes everything you need to create the ideal baby bottle for your developing baby: TWO full 5 oz. Easy Start™ Anti-Colic Bottles with a Size 0 Extra Slow Flow Nipple and a Size 1 Slow Flow Nipple, TWO full 9 oz. Easy Start™ Anti-Colic Bottles with a Size 2 Medium Flow Nipple and a Size 3 Fast Flow Nipple. Plus, TWO extra 5 oz and 9 oz Easy Start™ Anti-Colic Bottle bodies, ONE extra soft spout, ONE set of bottle handles, FOUR sealing discs, and ONE MAM Comfort™ pacifier. The baby bottle nipples and extra soft spout can be used on any of the 5 oz or 9 oz bottles. The feeding set items also comes with four sealing discs designed to convert MAM baby bottles into milk storage containers. The MAM Comfort™ pacifier is a super lightweight, 100% silicone, one-piece MAM pacifier specially designed for newborns. All MAM products are made from baby safe materials and are BPA and BPS free. Turn baby bottles into sippy cups with handles for toddlers when baby is ready to transition to independent drinking.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. Grow with Baby Gift Set Everything new parents and growing babies need The MAM Grow with Baby Gift Set includes everything you need to create the ideal baby bottle for your developing baby. The bottle accessories included are all interchangeable so you can mix and match the bottle parts to adapt the baby bottle to fit baby's individual feeding needs. The bottle nipples and extra soft spout can be used on any of the 5 oz or 9 oz bottles, and the handles can be added to the bottle when baby is ready to hold the bottle on their own. Nipple fits perfectly in baby’s mouth at any angle Vented bottle base for smooth milk flow Wide openings - easy to fill and clean Bottle cap doubles as a measuring cup Anti-slip surface keeps pacifier in baby’s mouth Lightweight pacifier with easy to grab design Bottles feature unique self-sterilizing design Pacifiers can also be sterilized with bottle self-sterilizer

MAM Grow with Baby Gift Set MAM Anti-Colic Bottles (5oz) MAM Anti-Colic Bottles (9oz) MAM Start Newborn Pacifiers MAM Perfect Start Pacifiers MAM Pacifier Clip Age 0+ Months 0+ Months 2+ Months 0+ Months 0+ Months SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-Colic Technology ✓ ✓ ✓ Quantity 15 Piece Set 1 Pack, 2 Pack, 3 Pack 1 Pack, 2 Pack, 3 Pack 2 Pack 2 Pack 1 Pack or 2 Pack Self-Sterilizing in the Microwave Included ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cost is a steal!
reviews.reviewText: Color is super cute and in my opinion, you get a lot of bottles and accessories for a great price! Love that you can take apart MAM bottles which makes cleaning so much easier! The only thing I would note when putting bottles back together you do have to make sure you twist on correctly. I have had milk leak after mixing formula and water. It can be hard to tell at times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love our Maam products
reviews.reviewText: We, all 3 of us, love our maam products. We have picked up a few of these kits for our little one as she grows, and they have been absolutely fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this set for the price! My daughter loves this pacifier & I love that the bottles can be completely & easily disassembled, cleaned, and sterilized each time in the microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for baby!
reviews.reviewText: We tried so many types of bottles for our son and these worked great for him! If you can get over having 5 separate parts per bottle to clean, I HIGHLY recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome shower gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Grows with baby
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t like how it only comes with 4 nipples but 8 bottles. I had to buy extra nipples. I prefer buying them by 2 or 3 packs of the complete bottle. I love the brand just not this bundle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just enough bottles
reviews.reviewText: Brought this for a co-worker she had her babies after New Years 2024. She likes the bottles just enough, she had a boy and a girl ( twins ).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, good quality. Wish there were less parts, but seems all brands have many parts. They don’t leak for the most part and are easy to clean. The pacifiers don’t work for my baby.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto - Justo lo que buscaba
reviews.reviewText: Me llegó en buenas condiciones, Justo lo que buscaba.

reviews.reviewTitle: Están hermosas las volvería a comprar
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Me encantaron 100% recomendado son la mejor inversión que pude aser .

reviews.reviewTitle: Super paquete ahorras mucho q comprando de 2 en 2
reviews.reviewText: Buenos bibis, calidad premiamos use evenflo, y entre estos avent y dr bowns estos se llevan la corona, lo único que no me gustó, es que traen un solo chupon por estaba, es decir 1 de 0 a 3 meses, 1 de 2 a 3,q q de 3 a 5 y 1 de vaso entrenador, para los demás biberones hay que comprar las otras 2 mamilas por etapa
Son muy facil de limpiar, son muy practikas y por el precio vale la pena
